title: Job’s Second Test
summary: Satan is permitted to afflict Job physically. Job is covered with painful sores, and his wife urges him to curse God. Job refuses. Three friends—Eliphaz, Bildad, and Zophar—come to mourn with him in silence.

faq.question: What does Satan say about Job this time?
faq.answer: He claims Job would curse God if he were physically afflicted.

faq.question: How do Job’s friends respond initially?
faq.answer: They sit in silence for seven days, overwhelmed by his suffering.
